Package pepse.world.daynight

package pepse.world.daynight
This package deals with all that is related to the day / night like the sun or the creation of a fake night to imitate the real day.

Night - A class that creates and imitates the transition between day and night. Sun - A class that creates a sun and makes it go around the world to imitate the day/night cycle of the real world. SunHalo - A class that creates the halo around the sun.

Author:
Noam shabat, Samuel Hayat
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pepse.world
    This package contains the classes that are used to represent the world in the simulation.
    pepse.world.trees
    This package deals with all that is related to the objects in the game area.
    pepse.world.UI
    this class is responsible to display the energy of the avatar to the player
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Night
    Class that creates and adds a night overlay GameObject to the specified game layer.
    Sun
    Class that creates and adds a sun GameObject to the specified game layer.
    SunHalo
    Class that creates and adds a sun halo GameObject to the specified game layer.
